mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID as productId, CATEGORY as category, PRODUCT_NAME_CHINESE as productNameChinese, PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH as productNameEnglish, PRODUCT_CHARACTER as productCharacter, PRODUCT_ANCESTRY as productAncestry, PRODUCT_DISEASE as productDisease, PRODUCT_LIFE as productLife, PRODUCT_INTRODUCE as productIntroduce, PRODUCT_IMAGE as productImage, PRODUCT_SUPPLIER as productSupplier FROM PET_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY = #{Category}
SELECT ITEM_ID as itemId, PRODUCT_ID as productId, ITEM_SPECIFICATION as itemSpecification, ITEM_PRICE as itemPrice, ITEM_STOCK as itemStock FROM PET_ITEM WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{ProductId}
